update taobao_stock_log set stock_id = #{stockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_date_id = #{stockDateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) as id from taobao_stock_log where stock_id=#{stockId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (order_id>0 or taobao_order_id>0)
